title: 45 Years After Failed Coup, Spain Declassifies Files About Why It Failed
summary_full: Ending more than four decades of conjecture, the Spanish government moved to publish documents from a long-secret investigation of a failed 1981 coup.
summary_public: Ending more than four decades of conjecture, the Spanish government moved to publish documents from a long-secret investigation of a failed 1981 coup.

ES.label: positive
ES.evidence: Spain Declassifies Files About Why It Failed
